籤詩版本二:
An haife shi a cikin iyali mai arziki tun ina yaro, duk abin da ke gabana koyaushe yana da daɗi
Bakin Zinare Mai Zauren Mai Martaba Mai Martaba Ya Baku, Zaiyi Suna A Duniya
詩意:
Wannan hexagram alama ce ta ƙofar dragon da aka buɗe.
Komai zai canza don mafi kyau.
解曰: An yi wa fursunonin afuwa. Rashin lafiya yana nufin zaman lafiya. Longmen yana da damar saduwa. Shahararren a ko'ina cikin babban birnin kasar.
籤詩故事一:
◇Luo Tong yana girmama shi
Daular Tang ta shirya tsaf domin kwantar da fanfo na Arewa, Sarkin sarakuna Taizong ya yanke shawarar jagorantar balaguron da kansa, amma ya makale a birnin Muyang, don haka Cheng Yaojin ya koma yankin Tsakiyar Tsakiya don ceto sojoji, amma abin takaici, sojojin Arewa Fan sun kama shi. Cheng Yaojin ya kasance haziki kuma mai iya magana, Gimbiya Tu Lu ta Beifan ta yi alkawarin barin shi ya koma tsakiyar fili domin neman karin taimako.
A gasar Maral Arts, an dauki hafsoshin sojan da za su ci arewa, Luo Tong dan shekara sha bakwai ya fito a kan gaba, ya kuma dauki kwamandan yakin arewa.
(Ma'anar "Luotong ta mamaye arewa" misali ne na saurayi mai nasara)
聖意: Yi addu'a a gida da gida, yi wa kanku addu'a, yi wa kanku addu'ar fatan alheri a kaka da hunturu, fatan alheri a kasuwanci, aure, da fatan alheri a Liujia.
古人: Luo Tong ya ba da girmamawa
第X籤: Nasara na Goma sha Uku Lott
